### LookupOption() {#aba48bdb75d749e5db9f48ce00a9b7bbe}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Option &#42; CommandLineParser::LookupOption (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/subcommand">SubCommand</a> &amp; Sub, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> &amp; Arg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> &amp; Value)</>}>
LookupOption - Lookup the option specified by the specified option on the command line.

If there is a value specified (after an equal sign) return that as well. This assumes that leading dashes have already been stripped.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/commandline-cpp/#l00392">392</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/commandline-cpp">CommandLine.cpp</a>.
